title: Amy Trask on virtual draft, Al Davis' draft day warnings, Raiders most recent move (Football 4/13)
description:
R-E-L-A-X". As she channels Aaron Rodgers, "relax" is Amy Trask's message to NFL front offices as they express concerns over the upcoming "virtual" NFL Draft. Trask, the former CEO of the Raiders and current CBS Sports football analyst, joins Will Brinson to discuss both this year's draft and draft memories from her time in both Los Angeles and Oakland. Will there be more hits or misses with 2020 picks? What was Al Davis like during the draft? Amy details handling controversial picks, her role on draft day and feelings on the Raiders most recent move during this conversation on the Pick Six podcast.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @AmyTrask
